channel.title: Some questions
channel.description:
I couldn't find any board where I could post this, that's why I am posting this here. Basically, I'm quite a noob when it comes to a RSPS, I've been working on PI bases alot, changing/removing objects, teleports, etc. The basic stuffs. I noticed most of the Tutorials in the Tutorials that I want to add on my server are for 317 Delta's. So I would like to know if it's a good choice for me to move to Delta, and if someone knows a good starting thing for me to work on. I've tried several sources and clients and I prefer one with no skills, except for combat. I downloaded a blank one, but it had no objectclicking. So whenever you open the bank, nothing happens. And I don't know (yet) how to make that work.
I also like the old gameframe (old icons, etc.) about Delta. Another reason to move to Delta for me.
To make a long story short, does anyone know a good source+client I can start off with? When I started PI, I downloaded the source and client from the "Complete noob project insanity guide", something like that for example, but then for 317 delta.
Regards, Derpington

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

I couldn’t find any board where I could post this, that’s why I am posting this here.
Basically, I’m quite a noob when it comes to a RSPS, I’ve been working on PI bases alot, changing/removing objects, teleports, etc. The basic stuffs.
I noticed most of the Tutorials in the Tutorials that I want to add on my server are for 317 Delta’s. So I would like to know if it’s a good choice for me to move to Delta, and if someone knows a good starting thing for me to work on. I’ve tried several sources and clients and I prefer one with no skills, except for combat. I downloaded a blank one, but it had no objectclicking. So whenever you open the bank, nothing happens. And I don’t know (yet) how to make that work.

I also like the old gameframe (old icons, etc.) about Delta. Another reason to move to Delta for me.

To make a long story short, does anyone know a good source+client I can start off with?
When I started PI, I downloaded the source and client from the “Complete noob project insanity guide”, something like that for example, but then for 317 delta.

Regards,
Derpington
